title: Home Page Business Flow
description: Covers user interactions and system expectations on the home page of Automation Test Store.

steps.expected_behavior: Displays promotional banner, featured/latest/bestseller product sections

steps.user_action: Click on a category in nav (Apparel & Accessories', 'Makeup', 'Skincare', 'Fragrance', 'Men', 'Haircare', 'Books)
steps.expected_behavior: Navigates to respective category listing page
Navigates to page listing discounted items and Special Offers
Filters product list to show only items from that brand

steps.user_action: Use the search bar and press Enter
steps.expected_behavior: Navigates to search results page with matching products

steps.user_action: Click on the 'Cart' in the top navigation

steps.expected_behavior: Navigates to that product's detail page

steps.user_action: Enter email in newsletter subscription field and click 'Subscribe'

steps.user_action: Click on the 'Checkout' in the top navigation
Click on the 'Login or Register' in the top navigation
Click on the left navigation 'Home' button
Click on the left navigation 'US Dollar' drop down for currency change
steps.expected_behavior: Changes the currency to US Dollar or Euro or Pound Sterling and updates product prices accordingly
